title: GDG DevFest Pisa 0.1 Announced
brief: GDG Pisa is proud to announce the first DevFest in Pisa! This is going to be a 100% community based events, don't miss the opportunity to participate.

title: Call for Papers Time
brief: DevFest Pisa announced! That means that it is time to open call for talk submissions!. We are looking for awesome talks on everything Google-related, don't be shy!

title: First speakers announced!
brief: We are happy to announce our first rockstar speakers!

title: Last days to apply for our C4P
brief: Looks like time is running really fast and our DevFest Pisa 0.1 is just behind the corner! Less then one month and we'll be all enjoying this amazing community experience together!

title: More speakers are joining the Agenda!
brief: It's been 10 days since we closed our call for paper and our organizing team worked really hard to prepare the final DevFest Agenda...

title: We are looking for helpers
brief: La DevFest Pisa 0.1 è oramai alle porte! Ci teniamo a ricordare che la DevFest è organizzata interamente su **base volontaria**. Purtroppo non possiamo permetterci di *assumere* dipendenti che ci diano una mano durante l'evento...
